definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: emptiness (on form v. Ges:§ 84 a, 1 b Sta:§ 95, 198 a, on usage cf. Lag:Or. ii. 60 f.) alw. c. [[תּׂהוּ]] q.v.;—[[תּׂהוּ וׇבׂהוּ]] Ge 1:2 of primæval earth; Je 4:23 of earth under judgment of ´[[י]]; [[קַו־תַהׁוּ]] [[וְאַבְנֵי בׂהוּ]] Is 34:11, the line of wasteness and the stones of emptiness, i.e. plummets, employed, not as usual for building, but for destroying walls; cf. Di & v. sub [[אבן]]
